shareBannerDescription: Got tools, cameras, gear, or equipment you don't use every day? Don't let them sit around collecting dust — turn them into extra income with Rento. Our platform makes it easy for you to share what you own with others who need it, whether it's for a day, a weekend, or longer.
overviewSubtitle: The leading platform for tool and equipment sharing
overviewDescription1: Rento is a revolutionary peer-to-peer rental platform that connects people who have tools and equipment with those who need them. Whether you're a DIY enthusiast, professional contractor, or just someone who needs a specific tool for a project, Rento makes it easy to find and rent what you need.
overviewDescription2: Our platform is built on the principles of community, sustainability, and economic efficiency. By sharing resources, we reduce waste, save money, and build stronger communities. Every rental transaction helps both the owner earn extra income and the renter access tools they might not otherwise afford.
overviewDescription3: With advanced security features, comprehensive insurance options, and a user-friendly interface, Rento ensures that every rental experience is safe, convenient, and rewarding for all parties involved.
feature1: Secure payment processing with escrow protection
feature2: Comprehensive insurance coverage for all rentals
feature4: Verified user profiles and review system
step1Description: Browse our extensive catalog of tools and equipment. Use filters to find exactly what you need, when you need it.
step2Description: Select your rental dates, review the terms, and complete your booking with our secure payment system.
step3Description: Meet with the owner, collect your rental, and enjoy using quality tools for your project.
ctaDescription: Join thousands of users who are already saving money and earning extra income through Rento.
pricingSubtitle: No hidden fees. Clear commission structure that works for everyone.
commissionDescription: We take a small 10% commission from each successful rental to cover platform costs, security, and support services.
renterBenefit1: No additional fees beyond the rental price
renterBenefit3: Access to quality tools at affordable rates
ownerBenefit2: No listing fees or monthly subscriptions
cameraDescription: Professional DSLR camera for photography projects
toolDescription: Heavy-duty drill for home improvement projects
campingDescription: Complete camping gear for outdoor adventures
insuranceDescription: Optional comprehensive insurance coverage for your rental items
premiumDescription: Boost your listing visibility and get more rental requests
faq1Answer: The commission is calculated as 10% of the total rental amount (excluding taxes and insurance). For example, if you rent an item for $50 per day for 3 days, the total is $150, and the commission would be $15.
faq2Question: When do I receive my earnings?
faq2Answer: Earnings are typically released to your account within 24-48 hours after the rental period ends, provided there are no disputes or issues reported.
faq3Answer: No hidden fees! The 10% commission is clearly displayed before each transaction, and there are no additional charges for listing items or using the platform.
pricingCTA: Join our community of successful item owners and start earning extra income with your unused tools and equipment.
featuresSubtitle: Everything you need for seamless tool sharing
securePaymentsDesc: Bank-level encryption and secure payment processing with escrow protection for all transactions.
verifiedUsersDesc: All users go through identity verification to ensure trust and safety in every transaction.
realTimeChatDesc: Instant messaging system for seamless communication between renters and item owners.
flexibleSchedulingDesc: Easy booking system with customizable rental periods and availability management.
reviewSystemDesc: Comprehensive rating and review system to help users make informed decisions.
mobileAppDesc: Fully responsive design that works perfectly on all devices and screen sizes.
smartMatchingDesc: Our AI-powered system matches you with the perfect tools and reliable owners based on your needs and location.
aiPoweredDesc: Advanced algorithms that continuously improve your rental experience.
dataProtectionDesc: Your personal information is protected with industry-standard encryption and privacy measures.
fraudProtectionDesc: Advanced fraud detection systems and secure payment processing to protect all users.
customerSupportDesc: 24/7 customer support team ready to help with any questions or issues.
featuresCTA: Join thousands of users who trust Rento for their tool sharing needs.
privacySubtitle: Your privacy is important to us. Learn how we protect your data.
personalInfoDesc: We collect information you provide directly to us when you create an account, list items, or make rentals.
personalInfo1: Name, email address, and phone number
usageInfoDesc: We automatically collect certain information about how you use our platform.
serviceProvisionDesc: To provide, maintain, and improve our rental platform services.
securitySafetyDesc: To ensure platform security and protect against fraud and abuse.
analyticsImprovementDesc: To analyze usage patterns and improve our services.
communicationDesc: To send you important updates and respond to your inquiries.
sharingDesc: We are committed to protecting your privacy and only share information in specific circumstances.
noShare1: Your personal information with third-party advertisers
noShare2: Your payment details with other users
noShare3: Your private messages without your consent
mayShare1: With service providers who assist in platform operations
mayShare2: When required by law or to protect rights and safety
mayShare3: With your explicit consent for specific purposes
accessRightDesc: You can request access to the personal information we hold about you.
correctionRightDesc: You can request corrections to inaccurate or incomplete information.
deletionRightDesc: You can request deletion of your personal information in certain circumstances.
portabilityRightDesc: You can request a copy of your data in a portable format.
privacyContactDesc: If you have questions about our privacy policy, please contact us.
helpSubtitle: We're here to help you get the most out of Rento
searchHelpDesc: Find answers to common questions quickly
liveChatDesc: Get instant help from our support team
faq1Question: How do I create an account?
faq1Answer: Click the 'Sign Up' button and provide your email, password, and basic information to create your account.
faq2Question: How do I list an item for rent?
faq2Answer: Go to 'Add Product' in your profile, fill in the item details, upload photos, and set your rental price.
faq3Question: How do I find items to rent?
faq3Answer: Use the search bar, browse categories, or filter by location, price, and availability to find what you need.
faq4Question: How does the rental process work?
faq4Answer: Select your dates, review the terms, make payment, and coordinate with the owner for pickup.
faq5Question: What if there's an issue with my rental?
faq5Answer: Contact our support team immediately. We have insurance and dispute resolution processes in place.
faq6Answer: Cancellation policies vary by owner. Check the listing details and contact the owner as soon as possible.
faq7Question: What payment methods do you accept?
faq7Answer: We accept major credit cards, debit cards, and digital wallets through our secure payment system.
faq8Answer: Payment is processed when you confirm your rental booking. The owner receives payment after the rental period.
faq9Answer: Yes, we charge a 10% platform fee on all successful rentals to cover our services and support.
emergencySupport: Emergency support available 24/7 for urgent issues.
resourcesDesc: Explore these resources to learn more about using Rento effectively.
